content.query:
EventsApplication
| where isnotempty(App)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count() by Application = App
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Top Applications By Usage

content.query:
EventsApplication 
| where App == '{ApplicationName1}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count() by User
| top 50 by Count
content.title: Top 50 Users Of {ApplicationName1}

content.query:
EventsApplication 
| where isnotempty(App)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by App
| sort by CCI desc
| project Application = App, ['CCI SCORE'] = CCI
content.title: Top Applications By CCI Score

content.query:
EventsApplication 
| where App == '{ApplicationName2}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count() by User
| top 50 by Count
content.title: Top 50 Users Of {ApplicationName2}

content.json: ðŸ’¡ _Click on a row in the above 'Top Applications By Usage' and 'Top Applications By CCI score' grid to view more details_

content.query:
EventsApplication 
| where isnotempty(Device)
| extend Device = iff(Device == "Other", "Other (value in Data)", Device)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count() by Device
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Device Breakdown

content.query:
EventsApplication 
| where isnotempty(Activity)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count()  by Activity
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Application Activities

content.json: ðŸ’¡ _Click on the above 'Device Breakdown' pie chart to view more details_
ðŸ’¡ _Click on the above 'Top 10 Application Activities' bar chart to view more details_

content.query:
EventsApplication
| where Device == (case("{DeviceName}"=="Other","Other(Grouped Value)","{DeviceName}"=="Other (value in Data)","Other","{DeviceName}"))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
content.title: Application Details For Device {DeviceName}

content.query:
EventsApplication 
| where Activity == '{ActivityName}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
content.title: Application Details For Activity {ActivityName}

content.query:
EventsApplication 
| where isnotempty(User)and isnotempty(AccessMethod)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count() by User, ['Access Method'] = AccessMethod
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Top Users By Access Method

content.json: ðŸ’¡ _Click on the above 'Top Users By Access Method' grid to view more details_

content.query:
EventsApplication 
| where User == '{UserName}'
    and AccessMethod == '{AccessMethod}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
content.title: Application Details For User {UserName} And Access Method {AccessMethod}

content.query:
EventsApplication 
| where isnotempty(User) and isnotempty( App)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize ['Total Client Bytes'] = sum(todecimal(ClientBytes)),['Total Server Bytes'] =sum(todecimal(ServerBytes)) by User,Application = App
content.title: Bytes Transferred

| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count() by OS
| sort by Count desc

    and Category == '{category}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id

parameters.name: TypeOfAlert
parameters.label: Type Of Alert
parameters.description: Select Alert Type to visualize data related to specific type of alert
parameters.query:
union isfuzzy=true AlertsDLP,AlertsCtep,AlertsCompromisedCredential,AlertsMalsite,AlertsMalware,AlertsPolicy,AlertsQuarantine,AlertsRemediation,AlertsSecurityAssessment,AlertsUba
| where isnotempty(AlertType)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| distinct tolower(AlertType)

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true AlertsDLP,AlertsCtep,AlertsCompromisedCredential,AlertsMalsite,AlertsMalware,AlertsPolicy,AlertsQuarantine,AlertsRemediation,AlertsSecurityAssessment,AlertsUba
| where isnotempty(DlpFile)
| where ('{TypeOfAlert:escapejson}' == '*' or AlertType in~ ({TypeOfAlert}))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count() by DlpFile
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 File Matches For DLP

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true AlertsDLP,AlertsCtep,AlertsCompromisedCredential,AlertsMalsite,AlertsMalware,AlertsPolicy,AlertsQuarantine,AlertsRemediation,AlertsSecurityAssessment,AlertsUba
| where ('{TypeOfAlert:escapejson}' == '*' or AlertType in~ ({TypeOfAlert}))
| where isnotempty(App)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize  Count = count() by App
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Applications Triggering Alerts

content.json: ðŸ’¡ _Click on the above 'Top 10 Applications Triggering Alerts' pie chart to view more details_

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true AlertsDLP,AlertsCtep,AlertsCompromisedCredential,AlertsMalsite,AlertsMalware,AlertsPolicy,AlertsQuarantine,AlertsRemediation,AlertsSecurityAssessment,AlertsUba
| where App == "{AppName}"
| where ('{TypeOfAlert:escapejson}' == '*' or AlertType in~ ({TypeOfAlert}))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Alert Details For {AppName}

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true AlertsDLP,AlertsCtep,AlertsCompromisedCredential,AlertsMalsite,AlertsMalware,AlertsPolicy,AlertsQuarantine,AlertsRemediation,AlertsSecurityAssessment,AlertsUba
| where ('{TypeOfAlert:escapejson}' == '*' or AlertType in~ ({TypeOfAlert}))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count() by tolower(AlertType)
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Alert Type Breakdown

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true AlertsDLP,AlertsCtep,AlertsCompromisedCredential,AlertsMalsite,AlertsMalware,AlertsPolicy,AlertsQuarantine,AlertsRemediation,AlertsSecurityAssessment,AlertsUba
| where ('{TypeOfAlert:escapejson}' == '*' or AlertType in~ ({TypeOfAlert}))
| where isnotempty(DlpProfile)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count() by DlpProfile
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 DLP Profiles

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true AlertsDLP,AlertsCtep,AlertsCompromisedCredential,AlertsMalsite,AlertsMalware,AlertsPolicy,AlertsQuarantine,AlertsRemediation,AlertsSecurityAssessment,AlertsUba
| where isnotempty(DlpRule) and isnotempty(DlpRuleSeverity)
| where ('{TypeOfAlert:escapejson}' == '*' or AlertType in~ ({TypeOfAlert}))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize  Count = count() by Rule = DlpRule, Severity = DlpRuleSeverity
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 DLP Rules

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true AlertsDLP,AlertsCtep,AlertsCompromisedCredential,AlertsMalsite,AlertsMalware,AlertsPolicy,AlertsQuarantine,AlertsRemediation,AlertsSecurityAssessment,AlertsUba
| where isnotempty(Policy)
| where ('{TypeOfAlert:escapejson}' == '*' or AlertType in~ ({TypeOfAlert}))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count() by Policy
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Policy Hits

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true AlertsDLP,AlertsCtep,AlertsCompromisedCredential,AlertsMalsite,AlertsMalware,AlertsPolicy,AlertsQuarantine,AlertsRemediation,AlertsSecurityAssessment,AlertsUba
| where isnotempty(AccessMethod) and isnotempty(Policy)
| where ('{TypeOfAlert:escapejson}' == '*' or AlertType in~ ({TypeOfAlert}))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| summarize Count = count() by Policy,Method = AccessMethod
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Policy Alerts by Access Method

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true AlertsDLP,AlertsCtep,AlertsCompromisedCredential,AlertsMalsite,AlertsMalware,AlertsPolicy,AlertsQuarantine,AlertsRemediation,AlertsSecurityAssessment,AlertsUba
| where ('{TypeOfAlert:escapejson}' == '*' or AlertType in~ ({TypeOfAlert}))
| where DlpRule =~ "{DlpRuleSelected}" and DlpRuleSeverity =~ '{DlpSeveritySelected}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by Id
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Alert Details For Dlp Rule {DlpRuleSelected} and Severity {DlpSeveritySelected}

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true AlertsDLP,AlertsCtep,AlertsCompromisedCredential,AlertsMalsite,AlertsMalware,AlertsPolicy,AlertsQuarantine,AlertsRemediation,AlertsSecurityAssessment,AlertsUba
| where ('{TypeOfAlert:escapejson}' == '*' or AlertType in~ ({TypeOfAlert}))

content.query:
NetskopeWebTransactions
| top 1 by TimeGenerated
| extend DateTime = todatetime(strcat(Date," ", Time))
| extend ['Time Difference'] = datetime_diff('Minute',TimeGenerated,DateTime)
| project ['Time Difference']
| extend ['Time Difference'] = strcat(['Time Difference'],' Minutes')
content.title: Latency of last ingested event (in minutes)

content.query:
NetskopeWebTransactions
| where ClientBrowser != '-' and isnotempty(ClientBrowser)
| summarize Count = count() by ClientBrowser
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Browser Breakdown

content.query:
NetskopeWebTransactions
| where ClientDeviceType != '-' and isnotempty(ClientDeviceType)
| summarize Count = count() by ClientDeviceType
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Device Breakdown

content.query:
NetskopeWebTransactions
| where ClientBrowser == '{Browser}'
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Web Transactions Details For {Browser}

content.query:
NetskopeWebTransactions
| where ClientDeviceType == '{DeviceName}'
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Web Transactions Details For {DeviceName}

content.query:
NetskopeWebTransactions
| where ClientUsername != '-' and ClientMethod != '-' and isnotempty(ClientUsername) and isnotempty(ClientMethod)
| summarize Count = count() by ['User Name'] = ClientUsername, Method = ClientMethod 
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Top Users By Access Method

content.query:
NetskopeWebTransactions
| where ClientCloudApp !='-' and ClientUsername != '-' and isnotempty(ClientCloudApp) and isnotempty(ClientUsername)
| summarize ['Total Client Bytes'] = sum(todecimal(ClientBytes)), ['Total Server Bytes'] = sum(todecimal(ServerBytes)) by Application = ClientCloudApp,['User Name'] = ClientUsername
| sort by ['Total Client Bytes'] desc
content.title: Bytes Transferred

content.json: ðŸ’¡ _Click on the above 'Top Users By Access Method' grid to view more details_

content.query:
NetskopeWebTransactions
| where ClientUsername == '{UserName}' and ClientMethod == '{Method}'
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Web Transactions Details For User {UserName} and Method {Method}
